name: International Aviation Academy of New Zealand
about: The International Aviation Academy of New Zealand (IAANZ), operating under the historic Canterbury Aero Club since 1928, is a premier institution for flight training. Located at Christchurch International Airport, IAANZ offers world-class training programs designed to produce 'airline ready' pilots. With a fleet of 28 aircraft and an exclusive satellite airfield, students gain experience in both controlled and uncontrolled airspace. IAANZ holds NZQA and NZ CAA Part 141 approvals, ensuring high standards. As a preferred training partner of Air New Zealand's Aviation Institute, IAANZ provides comprehensive training in a professional airline environment, preparing graduates for global aviation careers. With over 75 years of experience, IAANZ is the ideal choice for aspiring pilots seeking a robust and industry-relevant education.
services:
